extendedInfo.description: Forget the world. Fall in love with this enchanting zen puzzler.Set within an old abandoned house, the player restores order to the jumbled memories of the last occupant, and in doing so embarks on a haunting journey of self-discovery and reflection.* Over 140 cunningly crafted puzzles!* Over 20 secret bonus levels!* Hidden collectibles to discover!* Perfectly balanced difficulty curve!* New soundtrack by composer Steven Cravis* Localized for English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian), Chinese, Korean, Taiwanese, and Japanese.* Quell is now MOGA Enhanced! Available at major retailers, carrier stores and online at http://www.MOGAanywhere.com* Also supports Xperia Play, and Nyko controllers* Leaderboards and Achievements, powered by Google Play Services* Cloud saves (when logged into Google in-game)* Optimized for phones and tabletsSuitable for all ages, this is an experience that will stay with you long after you put it down.Note about permissions:The permission BILLING is used for optional in-app purchases (additional coins or a skeleton key). The ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is used only to detect when the phone has no network connection, in which case online features are disabled.

reviews.title: Great puzzler!
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic game for those times when you just need to unwind. Graphics and music are top notch, and the inclusion of Google play games services is the icing on the cake. Being able to sync game progress between tablet and phone elevates this game to the next level.
reviews.author: Adam Sweeney

reviews.title: Good overall
reviews.comment: More levels than previous game it seems but not as difficult. Really like the quell series though
reviews.author: clint hartshorn

reviews.title: A Puzzler\'s Joy
reviews.comment: Beautiful graphics gives wonderful ambiance to clever wee puzzles. Enjoying going for the perfect scores and collected nearly all the Achievements.  Another Quell triumph. Have completed all the levels and gone back to complete the Timekeeper levels. Now have all the jewels and timepieces. A great game for mental agility.
reviews.author: Alice Morland

reviews.title: Just beautiful. Great on my TV, too!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing this on my NVIDIA Shield connected to my home theater using a Nyko PlayPad Pro. The graphics are great on the 60\" display and the music is amazing. Class act.
reviews.author: Bill Rehbock

reviews.title: Wonderful but not as good as others
reviews.comment: They introduced some cool new facets to the puzzles, but I can\'t stand the \"hidden\" gems and passages - discovering them is not difficult or intellectually satisfying, rather is just tedious and annoying. Otherwise still well worth the price.
reviews.author: Johnny Strings

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Such a wonderful game! Most levels are on the easy side, but it happens occasionally that you get stuck. Hidden levels and gems are annoying to find, but I still give it 5 stars! Highly recommended!!!
reviews.author: Boris Ajdin

reviews.title: Top notch puzzle game
reviews.comment: Lots of easy levels but they get difficult eventually, particularly when you\'re going for perfect. Both Memento and Reflect offer artful, creative new features adding both fun and complexity to Quell\'s addictive challenges.
reviews.author: Bop Emerson

reviews.comment: Awesome game! You won\'t be dissappointed...worth every penny and can\'t wait to see what comes next!
reviews.author: toni dale

reviews.comment: I love the quell games. This is a great addition to the series.
reviews.author: Aaron Randolph

reviews.title: Gets harder & more expensive!
reviews.comment: Grrrrrr... I HATE in-app purchases!! - Love this & nearly done, but not buying more coins! - Uninstalling. :(
reviews.author: Marilyn C.

reviews.title: Good sequel
reviews.comment: Has enough new gameplay elements than its predecessors to keep you occupied for a long time.
reviews.author: Aaditya A

reviews.title: Zen
reviews.comment: Relaxing, yet keeps your brain on it\'s toes!
reviews.author: Joel Edwards

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Brilliant puzzler
reviews.author: Nairn Goodman

reviews.comment: I love these games.  Logic puzzles with a twist.
reviews.author: Baney Gary Duncan Horrillo

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best game ever
reviews.author: WhoeverCan Lie

reviews.comment: Good game well thought out....but needs to be alot longer and puzzles more challenging
reviews.author: edward malgapo

reviews.title: Try it!
reviews.comment: Challenging, pressure-free puzzles that are cool to explore.  Excellent story and music, and no special permissions.  This company deserves my compliments and my money!
reviews.author: karin schmitt

reviews.title: Perfect...
reviews.comment: There\'s nothing else to say. Just keeps getting better
reviews.author: Mason Kirk

reviews.title: Great Fun, Good Challange
reviews.comment: Hours of fun and mind challange.
reviews.author: Dick Curtis

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: A wonderfully cleaver game.
reviews.author: Corey Quackenbush
